title: Dear Maymie
description: While going through a box of photographs belonging to her elusive grandfather, Tess Danner suspects a family secret that could explain her grandparents' unusual relationship and shed light on the events that shaped her family. As Tess and her cousin, Maymie, trade correspondence and memories in an attempt to dig out the truth, the mystery unfolds to the reader through the undiscovered letters of their ancestors.
author: Debra K. Rodgers
